ConfigurationOption.Value: select h.wonum, h.hazardid, q.qualificationid, h.siteid, (select description from qualification where qualificationid = q.qualificationid and orgid = q.orgid) qualdesc, q.lbl_crafthazqualid, (select ldtext from longdescription where ldkey = q.lbl_crafthazqualid and ldownertable = 'QUALIFICATION' and ldownercol = 'DESCRIPTION') longdesc, q.orgid, h.wohazardid from lbl_crafthazqual q left outer join wohazard h on q.hazardid = h.hazardid and q.orgid = h.orgid where q.orgid = 'LBNL' and h.siteid = 'FAC'

List.ListEntry: wonum in (select wo.wonum from workorder wo where ( wo.lead = '${MX_LABOR_CODE}' or wo.wonum in (select lbl.refwo from lbl_labtrans lbl where lbl.lbl_transtype = 'PLAN' and lbl.laborcode = '${MX_LABOR_CODE}' )) and wo.status in (select value from synonymdomain where domainid = 'WOSTATUS' and maxvalue in ('APPR','INPRG') ) )
